testcase.name: Verification of Text Input field
testcase.system-out: Given first user launch the browser.........................................passed And enduser launch portal "http://www.uitestingplayground.com/".............passed When enduser click on "Text Input" link.....................................passed And click on on the textbox and insert text as "ABC"........................passed And click on the button.....................................................passed Then Verify the provide test in textbox and the name of button is same......passed
